summary: After a freak accident, a yuppie turns invisible and runs from a treacherous CIA official, while trying to cope with his new life.
cast: Chevy Chase|Daryl Hannah|Sam Neill|Michael McKean|Stephen Tobolowsky|Jim Norton|Pat Skipper|Paul Perri|Richard Epcar|Steven Barr|Gregory Paul Martin|Patricia Heaton|Barry Kivel|Donald Li|Rosalind Chao|Jay Gerber|Shay Duffin|Edmund L. Shaff|Sam Anderson|Elaine Corral Kendall|Ellen Albertini Dow|Jonathan Wigan|I.M. Hobson|John Carpenter|Chip Heller|Aaron Lustig|Brian Danker|Steven A. Hite|Tina Kotrich|Steve C. Porter|Theodore Carl Soderberg|Tirralan Watkins
title: Memorias de un hombre invisible
